body_html:
@evanluyifan - Please do update to TensorRT 3.0 GA, available from https://developer.nvidia.com/tensorrt . The most recent build posted there is numbered 3.0.2.

Again you don't need a "4.0" version of TensorRT - there's no such thing. TensorRT 3 will include libnvinfer4 out of the box.

And yes this PR does provide integration of TRT into TF. We have several future steps in mind to incrementally improve this integration and better leverage internal TF mechanisms; this is just the first step. I cannot comment on a timeline, however.

Thanks,
Cliff

body:
@evanluyifan - Please do update to TensorRT 3.0 GA, available from https://developer.nvidia.com/tensorrt .  The most recent build posted there is numbered 3.0.2.

Again you don't need a "4.0" version of TensorRT - there's no such thing.  TensorRT 3 will include libnvinfer4 out of the box.

And yes this PR does provide integration of TRT into TF.  We have several future steps in mind to incrementally improve this integration and better leverage internal TF mechanisms; this is just the first step.  I cannot comment on a timeline, however.

Thanks,
Cliff
